description:
Expand your SnowRunner garage with the Wolf Pack, a collection of Western Star’s latest and most versatile trucks! Get the 57X, the 47X and a 47X variant, as well as exclusive cosmetics in a single DLC!

Get behind the wheel of Western Star’s 3 newly-revealed powerhouses and make the best of their renowned versatility in all your SnowRunner jobs.

The Wolf Pack includes:
• The Western Star 57X
• The Western Star 47X NF1424 and its variant NF1430
• An exclusive Wolf livery compatible with all of the trucks available in the Wolf Pack. This livery is also compatible with the Western Star 49X truck - requires the Western Star 49X DLC.
• 4 Wolf stickers for the Western Star 57X, 47X NF1424, 47X NF1430. These stickers are also compatible with the Western Star 49X truck - requires the Western Star 49X DLC.
• An exclusive Phoenix livery for the Western Star 57X
• A Phoenix hood ornament for the Western Star 57X
• 4 Phoenix stickers for the Western Star 57X

Requires the base game SnowRunner to run. The Western Star Wolf Pack is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.
name: SnowRunner - Western Star Wolf Pack
